exampleInteractions.userInput: I'm building a recommendation system that uses collaborative filtering with matrix factorization. Users rate products and I decompose the user-item matrix using SVD to find latent factors, then use these to predict ratings for new products.

aiAnalysis.riskAssessment: Very High - Direct implementation of patented Amazon recommendation technology

specificViolations: Your described implementation directly matches Amazon's US10,789,552 patent claims 1 and 2, which cover collaborative filtering using matrix factorization with SVD for latent factor extraction.
evidence: Patent Claim 1 specifically covers: 'applying collaborative filtering using matrix factorization with latent factors derived from user-item interaction matrices'
Patent Claim 2 covers: 'matrix factorization uses singular value decomposition with regularization'
recommendations: IMMEDIATE: Do not implement this approach without licensing from Amazon
ALTERNATIVE 1: Use neural collaborative filtering (NCF) which uses neural networks instead of matrix factorization
ALTERNATIVE 2: Implement content-based filtering using product features instead of collaborative filtering
ALTERNATIVE 3: License Amazon's technology or use their recommendation API service
supportingDocuments: Prior art analysis: Koren et al. 2009 matrix factorization survey
Alternative implementation guide: Neural Collaborative Filtering approaches
